EduGym

Curriculum-aligned gymnastic movement designed for school groups and physical literacy.

Levels

Beginner

Core shapes, rolls and landings building safe foundation skills.

Intermediate

Develop strength and technique across apparatus with progressions.

Advanced

Refine skills, sequences and confidence for performance and comps.
